critique: The document expresses concern and determination regarding the influx of illicit drugs and the perceived failure of Canada to adequately address the issue. It conveys a sense of urgency and resolve to protect the nation's borders and citizens. The document expresses very little joy. The document expresses a moderate amount of sadness due to the harm caused by illicit drugs. The document expresses a moderate amount of anger towards Canada's perceived inaction. The document expresses a moderate amount of fear regarding the threat posed by illicit drugs and border security. The document expresses a moderate amount of disgust towards drug trafficking organizations. The document expresses a low amount of surprise.
